properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where (ProcessCommandLine contains " -c" and (ProcessVersionInfoOriginalFileName =~ "python.exe" or (FolderPath endswith "python.exe" or FolderPath endswith "python3.exe" or FolderPath endswith "python2.exe"))) and (not(((InitiatingProcessCommandLine contains "-E -s -m ensurepip -U --default-pip" and InitiatingProcessFolderPath endswith "\\python.exe" and InitiatingProcessFolderPath startswith "C:\\Program Files\\Python") or InitiatingProcessFolderPath endswith "\\AppData\\Local\\Programs\\Microsoft VS Code\\Code.exe")))

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects execution of python using the "-c" flag. This is could be used as a way to launch a reverse shell or execute live python co
